snippet: The release of the new iPhone, expected to be announced on Wednesday, could add one-quarter to one-half of a percentage point to the annualized growth rate of America's gross domestic product next quarter.
abstract: The release of the new iPhone, expected to be announced on Wednesday, could add one-quarter to one-half of a percentage point to the annualized growth rate of America's gross domestic product next quarter.

headline.main: How the iPhone 5 Could Bolster the Economy
